text: The 1955 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1955 college football season. Under head coach Pappy Waldorf, the team compiled an overall record of 2–7–1 and 1–5–1 in conference. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1955 California Golden Bears football team
